trends: There has been one other sighting in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around May 31st 1988
Summary: Drop a friend off from fishing, started to pull away when he starts yelling at me to look up.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a cigar shape object with a purple hue too it, non-blinking lights! I was dropping a friend off from fishing one summer night about 8:30pm, when I started to pull away my friend starts yelling at me to look up, he's jumping up and down, up and down! I jump out saying, what's the problem!! He's saying LOOK!! LOOK!! It was a UFO! It was a cigar shape object that was pretty dame long. I'm guessing it was at a altitude of about 5000 feet, it could of been higher but I'm gonna say 5000 ft! the freaky thing about this was, you couldn't see both ends of this UFO at one time that's how long it was, It did have a purple hue to it with no noise that I could hear but then again it was pretty high up. The speed of this thing was slow but eventually it faded away and then it was gone.. After it was all over with all I could do was stand there with a dumbfounded look on my face, starring, same thing with friend!
